name: Comodo Ice Dragon  Navigator Toolbox fixes
description: Theres alot of minor problems with the Navigator Toolbox with Comodo IceDragon v26 and back, like the effect adding lightweight themes has, spacing issues etc etc  This scripts intended to fix basic problems or problems with how i want the setup
additional_info: Theres 4 configurations depending if you use Tabs Always in Titlebar (required*) with or without UI Fixer or Movable Firefox Button , and have sofar checked TabMixPlus with UI Fixer & Tabs Always in Titlebar and think its right. Will add two more configs for TMP with Movable Firefox Button or just Tabs Always in Titlebar later as ive not worked out how to setup Userstyles 'Style Settings' this script just has commented out sections to swap around depending on which addons you use ontop. By default just need to install Tabs Always in Titlebar (its restartless) for it to show up properly. The screeshots explain everything better * required because userstyle scripts for tabs in titlebar like this one breaks the CID window control (min/max/close) buttons which are somewhat tied to the tabtoolbar position unlike standard windows controls. One addon that does a similar thing to CIDs custom buttons that also puts tabs in the titlebar in normal window is Hide Captions Titlebar Plus but havent checked if it works with CID, but its great with Fx
